What is the role of a Gazebo plugin in sensor simulation?

Add a camera sensor to the front of your simulated robot's chassis. Configure the gazeboroscamera plugin to publish images to a ROS 2 topic. Use RViz2 to visualize the camera feed.

Your simulated robot can now "see" the world! This is the first step towards building autonomous robots that can perceive and react to their environment.
  • Add a camera to a URDF and view the image feed in RViz2.
  • Add a LiDAR sensor and visualize the point cloud data.
  • Explain the role of a Gazebo sensor plugin.
